VUPShionMod:MindBloom.NAME: Mind Bloom
DESCRIPTIONS: While walking and traversing through the Spire, your thoughts suddenly begin to feel very... #p~real... ~ NL NL Imaginings of #rAdventurers and #yCollected #ySpirits begin to manifest themselves into reality. NL The sensation is quickly fleeting, what do you do?
You have been here before, and you know that. NL NL Again and again, chasing the same adventurer... NL NL Is this real? NL NL How many times have you been slayed?

Everything makes sense now. NL The only purpose, the endless combat, the #pCorrupted Heart. NL NL this is the way it always was. NL This is the way it always will be. NL And will be forgotten again soon...
OPTIONS: [I am War] #rFight a special enemy. #gObtain a Rare Relic.
